item.title: How Datadog Agent Works
item.description: I am sure, you must be aware of Datadog. Datadog is infrastructure monitoring as a service. Read more here: datadog.com Ever wondered how Datadog agent works? We use Datadog in SAS CI360 to monitor our infrastructure. It provides quite a lot of features like APN, distributed tracing, etc. But, how Datadog knows all the information about your service without adding any code to our microservices? We need to include a Datadog agent in our JVM startup.
